entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Toronto
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:12 PM EST Wednesday 21 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -2.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 11:00 PM EST Wednesday 21 December 2022
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -2.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 61 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -9.2°C
Wind: NE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 4

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 21 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the morning then 60 percent chance of rain or drizzle in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 21 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain or drizzle in the evening. Rain beginning near midnight. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 21 December 2022
